title: [GAMEPLAY] nashor makes you fly ! :)
body:
Hi ! First of all, as a french i'll have to ask you to forgive my poor english. 
I would like to know if its normal that when using abilities such as yi's Q, xin's E on baron nashor you can end up having a weird animation of the character floating for a small lapse of time.
During that animation you can't attack, and therefore in some situation it could be better (yet counter-intuitive imho) not to use these abilities on nash to optimize DPS.

I hope this post can help.

replies.body:
>Hi ! First of all, as a french i'll have to ask you to forgive my poor english.

lel its okie

Intended :D

http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-53-notes

"Baron Nashor
He's like a piece of terrain. A big, fat, purple piece of terrain you can't move through.
WALL OF NASHOR Baron Nashor now cannot be walked through even with effects like Ghost or Fizz's Nimble Fighter, which grant this ability"

I get that you can't walk through Baron Nashor, but I think it's strange how Master Yi's Q interacts with it.

The Q does damage, but when it's done, Yi gets placed so close that the "Wall of Nashor" kicks in and knocks Yi back super slowly. This is really annoying since you can't move or attack during this and Baron is free to engage you. I get not being able to walk through him with things such as Fizz's passive or Phantom Dancer, but it's very counter intuitive with Yi. Shouldn't Yi land outside of the "Wall of Nashor" when his Q finishes?
But... that patch hasn't dropped yet...? o_O
